information.name: ucrm-client-signup-plugin
information.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup, and select payment plans, and submit payment information.
information.author: Charuwts, LLC

configuration.label: Plugin Subscription ID
configuration.description: This is provided in your order confirmation from Charuwts, LLC. The card you provided will be charged based on plugin usage. See: https://github.com/charuwts/UCRM-Client-Signup/wiki/0-Setup for more details.

configuration.label: Plugin Unique Key
configuration.description: This is provided in your order confirmation from Charuwts, LLC.

configuration.label: Plugin Domain
configuration.description: Enter as you provided it at purchase. This is also listed in your order confirmation email.

configuration.label: Plugin Public URL
configuration.description: Bug Fix, detecting public url isn't accurate enough in some use cases. Try with and without server port included.

configuration.label: Gateway Customer, Custom Attribute ID
configuration.description: The value is set when a client signs up or can be done manually for legacy clients. Required to charge customer card on file when invoice is due. If this custom attribute is not set on a client the client will not be automatically charged. To create a custom attribute visit -> system/other/custom-attributes

configuration.label: Stripe Secret Key
configuration.description: This is your Stripe API Secret Key. Make sure, you use LIVE credentials in production. https://stripe.com/docs/keys#api-keys Also Note: These currencies supported by UCRM are not supported by Stripe [VEF, GHC, TVD, LVL, TRL, LTL, CUP, GGP, IMP, JEP, SYP, IRR, OMR, BYN, KPW, ZWD]

configuration.label: Stripe Public Key
configuration.description: This is your Stripe API Public Key. Make sure, you use LIVE credentials in production. https://stripe.com/docs/keys#api-keys

configuration.label: Form Title
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before form description

configuration.label: Form Description
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before the form. (Can contain HTML)

configuration.label: Completion Text
configuration.description: Text shown upon signup completion. (Text Only) - Defaults To: Thank you for signing up! You will receive an invitation to access your account upon approval.
